pullrequest.title: An Intel Real Sense R200 Camera plugin

content.raw:
Can you assign copyright to `Open Source Robotics Foundation`? There are a couple reasons for this:

1. OSRF will have an easier time enforcing the software license.
2. OSRF would be able to change license if/when a new/better license than Apache2 appears.

Light reading on this subject (we don't have a CLA, so we are requiring transfer of copyright):

1. https://www.gnu.org/licenses/why-assign.en.html
1. http://producingoss.com/en/copyright-assignment.html
content.html:
Can you assign copyright to Open Source Robotics Foundation? There are a couple reasons for this:

  1. OSRF will have an easier time enforcing the software license.
  2. OSRF would be able to change license if/when a new/better license than Apache2 appears.

Light reading on this subject (we don't have a CLA, so we are requiring transfer of copyright):

  1. https://www.gnu.org/licenses/why-assign.en.html
  2. http://producingoss.com/en/copyright-assignment.html
